items.question: How do I book a table or cabin?
items.answer: Call +44 1223 921122 or email {{brand.supportEmail}} to book. Book early for big matchdays or heated cabins.

items.question: Do you show live sports?
items.answer: Yes — wall-to-wall HD screens indoors plus an outdoor projector for major fixtures. We’re a short walk from Abbey Stadium.

items.question: Do you offer takeaway or delivery?
items.answer: Yes. Call for collection, or order delivery via Uber Eats, Deliveroo, or Just Eat when available.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: We have a small on-site car park (limited spaces). Additional paid parking is across the road at Cambridge Retail Park.

items.question: Are you family- and dog-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely. High chairs available; kids’ spice tweaks on request. Dogs are welcome in the bar and garden with water bowls provided.

items.question: Is the pub accessible?
items.answer: Yes. Wheelchair ramp access via the rear and an accessible WC on the ground floor. Ask staff if you need assistance.

items.question: Can you handle dietary requirements?
items.answer: Many Nepalese dishes are naturally gluten-free; vegetarian and vegan options are available. Tell us your allergies and we’ll guide you.
